name: ShootyRocks
description:
Shooty Rocks is an endless space shooter for iOS inspired by the arcade classic Asteroids - but now in THREE DIMENSIONS!!!

Survive for as long as you can flying around the earth shooting apart or avoiding asteroids as they orbit.

Shooty Rocks is available in the AppStore from 25th December for FREE!

http://shooty.rocks

Future Features

  • Powerups including shields, alternative weapons
  • Aliens!
  • Multiple ships
  • Add other celestial objects to clear
  • Ship destruction on impact
  • Multiplayer!
